sentences: Arendas pideva tööga oma mängutehnika meisterlikkuseni.
Tee edenes aeglaselt, sest autojuhid ei julgenud sellise koormatuse juures täita kiirust arendada.
context: The word 'arendama' is the infinitive form of the Estonian verb meaning to develop, improve, or advance something. It's used in contexts like developing skills (oma võimeid), improving through continuous work (pideva tööga oma mängutehnika meisterlikkuseni), or advancing speedtäita kiirust arendada). The dictionary shows it has multiple meanings including making better/qualitative, leading to a higher level, continuing forward, deepening/extending, and in mathematics representing an expression as a sum.
